settings.heading: ABOUT US
settings.subtext: SARAY Jewellery was established in Dubai Gold Market back in 1987 as a prominent gold wholesaler. It expanded steadily through exclusive partnerships with major gold companies in Italy, Turkey, Hong Kong and Spain. Within a few years, SARAY Jewelry expanded its operations to a much larger scale across Dubai, which became one of the most important gold hubs in the world.
